price: Ɛna mogyae deε mo Wura Nyankopͻn abͻ ama mo a εyε mo ayerenom? Daabi, moyε amanfoͻ mmaratofoͻ paa“.
arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٌ عَادُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: watadharūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum bal antum qawmun ʿādūna
